channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Trade Deficit Widens Despite Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: The monthly trade deficit and imports rebounded in November after shrinking significantly in prior months, new data show.

item.title: Maxim Naumov to Skate at 2026 Olympics After Parents’ Death in D.C. Plane Crash
item.description: After his parents died in the midair collision over Washington, D.C., a year ago, Maxim Naumov struggled to put on his skates. Now he will compete for...

item.title: Trump has sued universities for billions. Here's what the strategy tells us
item.description: Each deal between colleges and the administration is unique, but they have common goals: altering the culture at powerful institutions and making thei...

item.title: European Union Labels Iran’s Revolutionary Guard a Terrorist Group
item.description: The move, which comes after the killing of protesters, brings the European Union in line with the United States and Canada.

item.title: Senegal and Morocco fined and players banned after African Cup final chaos
item.description: Africa's soccer body issued fines worth more than $1 million and banned Senegal's coach and Senegalese and Morocco players Wednesday following a shamb...

item.title: DHS funding battle risks shutdown. And, Fed holds rates steady despite Trump pressure
item.description: Senate Democrats threaten a partial government shutdown over DHS funding. And, the Fed defies President Trump's pressure and holds rates steady to fig...

item.title: Why Some Cold States Are Making It Cheaper to Run a Heat Pump
item.description: New discounts can make heat pumps go from a bad investment to a good idea.

item.title: Saying Minnesota has 'been through a lot,' Klobuchar announces bid for governor
item.description: Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar announced her run for Minnesota governor early Thursday. There is already a crowded field of Republicans in a race where...

item.title: Winter Storm Could Bring Deep Snow to the Carolinas, Virginia
item.description: Up to a foot is possible this weekend in parts of the Southeast and on Cape Cod, with smaller amounts expected for much of the East Coast.

item.title: Why these women break the law to sell their eggs for IVF
item.description: Women in India were told they couldn't be paid for their eggs. The result: a black market for eggs from women in need of money to survive.

item.title: Camping on Thwaites Glacier
item.description: After working and camping for a week on Thwaites Glacier, scientists were ready to start drilling into the ice, if only the weather would let them.

item.title: Starmer and Xi Meet to Reset Ties Between Britain and China

item.title: European Union Labels Iran’s Revolutionary Guard a Terrorist Group
item.description: The move, which comes after the killing of protesters, brings the European Union in line with the United States and Canada.

item.title: U.K.’s Starmer Meets Xi Jinping in Beijing as Ties Warm

item.title: Trump Warns Iran With Military Muscle, but Risks a Regional War
item.description: Iran’s Islamic Republic, weakened by airstrikes in June and huge popular unrest, warns that it will strike back hard if attacked by the United States....
